rules_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
When Furies of the Natural Order enters, bless any number of target players. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant player
At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player gains life equal to the amount of life they’ve gained this turn, then loses life equal to the amount of life they’ve lost this turn.
